amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 118-4 to amend the bill to direct OMB and CEA to incorporate the inflationary impact of the debt servicing costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cloud amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Cloud.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cloud amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
